description:
About Fixated:
  • Fixated provides world-class representation and growth opportunities for digital creators, helping them evolve their brands in a dynamic entertainment landscape. We offer a full-service solution designed to maximize creators' revenue and content potential.
Role Overview:
  • As Brand Partnerships Manager, you will play a pivotal role in driving integrated partnerships with leading brands and agencies, achieving significant revenue growth across our talent and content divisions. This role requires someone with a proven track record in securing brand deals, strong sales leadership, and existing relationships with key players in the industry.
  • Develop and manage a robust sales pipeline to achieve revenue targets across Fixated's talent and content divisions
  • Leverage existing relationships with brands, agencies, and media buyers to secure impactful partnerships
  • Create compelling packages, pitches, deal structures, contracts & execute campaigns to win new business & achieve revenue goals across Fixated’s roster of talent
  • In addition to leading outbound brand activations, you will manage & oversee inbound partnership requests, respond to briefs and ensure all client needs are met
  • Oversee & manage key aspects of the sales process from campaign inception to completion
  • Work with the internal & external teams to ensure client success across campaigns
  • Identify new opportunities for revenue generation for our talent and assist in the execution of such opportunities
  • Accurately forecast and report your Brand Partnerships revenue on a monthly, quarterly and annual basis
  • Regularly report back on results, performance and conversion of campaigns and creating case studies

Your qualifications include:
  • A minimum of 5+ years of experience in brand partnerships, sponsorships, or creator activations
  • Strong sales background with prior experience with brands, agencies, and/or media buyers
  • Existing rolodex of agency and advertiser relationships
  • A deep understanding of the creator economy and the digital entertainment landscape
  • Self-starter, detail oriented, and a team player
  • Dedicated work ethic and the ability to drive strong results
  • Superior organizational skills, coupled with exceptional written, verbal, and presentation capabilities
responsibilities:

Create compelling packages, pitches, deal structures, contracts & execute campaigns to win new business & achieve revenue goals across Fixated’s roster of talent

Identify new opportunities for revenue generation for our talent and assist in the execution of such opportunities

Regularly report back on results, performance and conversion of campaigns and creating case studies
